name: RuN (itch) (Karanvir3215)
description:
I made a low-poly infinite runner in my free time as a practice game. It's the first game I've ever actually finished, because I kept trying to start with projects I couldn't even understand. Occasionally the jump animation skips, I have no idea why. Double jump is a thing. If you mess around with the mouse, you might find a secret ;) . Hope you enjoy!

Of the assets used in this game, most of them were free assets from the Unity Asset Store. 

Assets used:

  • Standard Assets - Unity Technologies
  • TextMesh Pro - Unity Technologies
  • Low Poly Style - Tree Pack - Agile Reaction
  • Farland Skies - Cloudy Crown
